mapper.select: SELECT pcode, pname FROM product WHERE pname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND dept1no=10

SELECT p.pcode, p.pname, p.pprice, p.bno, b.bname, dept1no, dept2no, itype, iloc, pvolume, ptype, rates FROM (SELECT * FROM product WHERE pname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND dept1no=10) p LEFT JOIN brand b ON p.bno=b.bno LEFT JOIN (SELECT pcode, itype, iloc FROM IMG WHERE itype='thumb') i ON p.pcode=i.pcode
